title: About This Tool
subtitle: An AI-powered companion for exploring the Ra Material

seek.title: Seek
seek.description: Ask questions and receive AI-powered answers with verified quotes from the Ra Material. Each response includes direct citations you can verify.

explore.title: Explore
explore.description: Navigate an interactive concept graph showing relationships between key ideas in the Ra Material. Discover connections and explore related quotes.

study.title: Study
study.description: Follow guided learning paths with structured lessons, reflection prompts, and quizzes. Track your progress as you deepen your understanding.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search the Ra Material by meaning. Find specific quotes with Sentence mode, or explore broader concepts with Passage mode.

howItWorks.title: How Seek Works
howItWorks.subtitle: When you ask a question in the Seek feature, here's what happens behind the scenes:

step1.title: Ask a Question
step1.description: Type any question about the Law of One, concepts from the Ra Material, or spiritual topics covered in the sessions.

step2.title: AI Searches
step2.description: Your question is converted into a mathematical representation and compared against all ~1,500 Q&A pairs from the 106 sessions.

bullets.quotes: Direct quotes from Ra in highlighted cards

warning.label: Important:
warning.text: The AI's explanatory text is meant to help you understand, but it should not be considered authoritative and may contain errors. Like all AI language models, this chatbot can sometimes "hallucinate" or generate inaccurate information. Only the direct quotes from Ra (shown in the highlighted quote cards) are authentic passages from the Ra Material.

llResearch.title: About L/L Research
llResearch.intro: The Ra Material, also known as <emphasis>The Law of One</emphasis>, was channeled between 1981 and 1984 through Carla Rueckert by the social memory complex Ra. The sessions were facilitated by Don Elkins (questioner) and Jim McCarty (scribe).
llResearch.description: L/L Research is the nonprofit organization that originally published the Ra Material and continues to steward these teachings. Founded by Don Elkins, Carla Rueckert, and Jim McCarty, L/L Research has dedicated itself to making the Law of One freely available to seekers worldwide.

copyright.title: Copyright and Attribution
copyright.intro: The Ra Contact (The Law of One) is copyrighted by L/L Research, which has generously made the material available for free personal and non-commercial use.
copyright.guidelinesTitle: According to L/L Research's copyright guidelines:

guidelines.quote: The material may be freely quoted for personal, educational, and non-commercial purposes
guidelines.attribution: Attribution should be given to L/L Research and the Law of One
guidelines.commercial: Commercial use requires explicit permission from L/L Research

copyright.verification: All quotes displayed in this study companion link directly to the source at <link>lawofone.info</link> for verification and further study.

projectDetails.title: Project Details
projectDetails.intro: The Law of One Study Companion is an independent, open-source project created to help students of the Ra Material explore and understand the teachings more easily.
projectDetails.supportNote: If you find this tool helpful, please consider <link>supporting L/L Research directly</link>.

technical.title: Technical Details
technical.intro: For those interested in the technical implementation:

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.mainWarning: This tool is far from a primary study of the Ra Material and should only be used to supplement your study or for curiosity.
disclaimer.notReplacement: It is not a replacement for reading the original sessions directly.
disclaimer.limitations: Like all AI language models, this chatbot has limitations and can potentially provide inaccurate or misleading information. The AI may sometimes "hallucinate" (generate information that doesn't exist in the source material) or misinterpret Ra's teachings. Only the highlighted quote cards contain verified passages from the Ra Material—all other explanatory text is AI-generated interpretation that may contain errors.
disclaimer.verification: Always verify important information by consulting the original Ra Material at lawofone.info or in the published books available from L/L Research. For serious study of the Law of One, there is no substitute for reading the primary source material.

feedback.title: Feedback and Questions
feedback.intro: This tool is continuously evolving based on user feedback. If you encounter issues or have suggestions, we'd love to hear from you:

footerQuote.text: You are every thing, every being, every emotion, every event, every situation. You are unity. You are infinity. You are love/light, light/love. You are. This is the Law of One.
